name: 99Bottles
description:
"99Bottles is, without a doubt, the single greatest game of all time ever made in the history of really good games!"

- the guy who made this game

Now you too can experience such a masterpiece! Immerse yourself in a world of breathtaking graphics, stellar gameplay, and a beautiful soundtrack too. 99Bottles is completely free-to-play, so download it now and get ready for your new favorite game!

IMPORTANT

If you're playing on PC, use the arrow keys to move and Z to interact.

Alternate PC controls, use WASD to move and J to interact.

If you're playing on a Gameboy, use the D-Pad to move and A to interact.
